reference.title: lcGapAnalysis
reference.shortdesc: The <lcGapAnalysis> compares existing learning objectives to current job task analysis.

section.title: Contains
section.p: The content model of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

section.title: Contained By
section.p: The parents of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

example.title: Example: lcGapAnalysis
example.codeblock: ... <lcGapAnalysis> <title>Gap Analysis</title> <lcGapItem> <title>Gap item</title> <lcPlanObjective>Learn the basics before you go further.</lcPlanObjective> <lcJtaItem>Current learning objectives provide guidance to developing small modules with terminal learning objectives.</lcJtaItem> <lcGapItemDelta>Current learners do not have the capability to approach learning development in a modular strategy that saves time and costs across the enterprise.</lcGapItemDelta> </lcGapItem> </lcGapAnalysis> ...
